mapper.select: SELECT p.prod_no prodNo, u.user_no userNo, h.hall_no hallNo, p.prodname prodName, p.prodtype prodType, p.beginshow beginShow, p.endshow endShow, p.beginrez beginRez, p.endrez endRez, p.showtime showTime, p.viewtime viewTime, p.viewgrade viewGrade, p.notice notice, p.cancelinfo cancelInfo, p.status status, p.posterpath posterPath FROM product p, users u, hall h WHERE p.user_no = u.user_no AND p.hall_no = h.hall_no ORDER BY prodNo DESC, userNo DESC;
